form.label: Userflows
form.description: Choose an application to view userflows data

input.label: Select an Application:
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism | stats dc by appName, appId

search.query: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=UserflowsSummary" appName="$appName$" | head 1 | rex "\((?<metric>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.?\d*|None)\,(?<percent>\-?\d+\.?\d*|None)\)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(mvzip(metric,val),percent) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<METRIC>.*?)\",(?<VALUE>\d+\.*\d*),(?<PERCENT_CHANGE>.*)"| sort -VALUE | table METRIC, VALUE, PERCENT_CHANGE

index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=UserflowsRankedFailed" appName="$appName$" | head 1 | rex "\((?<userflow>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.?\d*|None)\,(?<unit>.*?)\)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(mvzip(userflow,val),unit) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<USERFLOW>.*?)\",(?<FAILURE_RATE>\d+\.*\d*),(?<UNIT>.*)"| sort -VALUE | table USERFLOW, FAILURE_RATE, UNIT

table.title: Userflows - click on a userflow for more information

search.query: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=UserflowsChangeDetails" appName="$appName$" | rex "\(Name=\"(?<USERFLOW>.+?)\",volume=(?<VOLUME>\d+),foregroundTime=(?<FOREGROUND_TIME>\d+\.?\d*s),failed=(?<FAILED>\d+),failRate=(?<FAILURE_RATE>\d+\.?\d*%),successful=(?<SUCCESSFUL>\d+),revenueAtRisk=(?<REVENUE_AT_RISK>\$\d+\.?\d*)\)" max_match=30 | dedup USERFLOW sortby -_time | sort +USERFLOW | table USERFLOW, VOLUME, FOREGROUND_TIME, FAILED, FAILURE_RATE, SUCCESSFUL, REVENUE_AT_RISK
